Dear {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
Thank you for contacting LegalZoom for your business needs. In regard to your inquiry, LegalZoom can assist you in making the changes you are requesting. We simplify the process for you by preparing and filing the Articles of Amendment with your respective Secretary of State, as well as by drafting customized, state-specific Bylaws & Resolutions for your business.
For your reference, general information regarding Amendments and Bylaws & Resolutions has been outlined below. If you would like to get specific, detailed information on your personal situation, please contact a Business Formation Specialist at the phone number listed below. By speaking with a Specialist will be able to assist with answering further questions, as well as building a customized package to best benefit your needs.
For your convenience, we have listed all relevant pricing below.
AMENDMENT Rush - $239.00 + state fee - (10-15 business days)* Standard - $129.00 + state fee + shipping - (20-30 business days)
To view the state fee for your state, please follow the "GET STARTED" link below and select your state from the drop-down list.
GET STARTED http://www.legalzoom.com/additional-business-services/articles-of-amendment-corporation-llc.html
BYLAWS & RESOLUTIONS Rush - $199.00 - (3-5 business days) Standard - $99.00 + shipping - (7-10 business days)
You may purchase an editable Microsoft Word format of the Bylaws & Resolutions for an additional fee of $50.00. This option must be added by speaking to a Specialist over the phone.
GET STARTED http://www.legalzoom.com/additional-business-services/stand-alone-bylaws-resolutions.html
* Some states may have delays which affect the listed turnaround time. To determine if your state is affected, please contact a Specialist at the phone number listed below.
Thank you for contacting LegalZoom with your business inquiries, and we look forward to assisting you. If you have any additional questions, please feel free to contact us by phone at the phone number listed below.
Best regards,
